text: Barbara Darrow (November 18, 1931 - August 26, 2018) was an American movie and television actress. She was born in Los Angeles, California. Darrow made mostly B-movie movies in the 1950s. These included The Monster That Challenged The World and Queen of Outer Space. She replaced Marla English opposite Spencer Tracy in The Mountain. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Barbara Darrow at TVguide Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Hollywood
title: Barbara Darrow
